summary: Adds a Headless Horseman Companion to the warrens in Markarth
descriptionHtml:
Headless Horseman Companion - by badreaper001
----------------------------------------
Please endorse if you like this mod! 

CHANGELOG

None so far


=============================

DESCRIPTION

This mod adds a Headless Horseman Companion to The Warrens in Markarth.
He\' good with one handed or duel weapons .
Been a ghost i\'ve giving him the light foot perk to stop him setting off traps.
He lvl up with you.
He very headstrong in battle.

REQUIREMENTS

Not fearing ghosts.


INSTALLATION

1. Unzip the file contents to steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data
2. Activate HeadlessHorsemanCompanion.esp in the Nexus Mod Manager or the Skyrim Launcher.



CREDITS

Me
author: badreaper001
